pages.text: Jaekelopterus was a large predatory eurypterid which is known to have lived in fresh and brackish water. Jaekelopterus exhibited gigantism, and it showed a lightweight adaptation like Arthropleura, which allowed it to grow so huge. Discovery of the eyes show that it had high visual acuity and had many lenses in their compound eyes.
$(l)Eats:$() Raw/Cooked Fish$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Raw Fish$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Block Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Egg Collection Phial
